Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.util.EnumResolver

  • Packages that use EnumResolver 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.deser
    Contains implementation classes of deserialization part of data binding.
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.deser.std
    Contains public standard implementations of abstraction that Jackson uses.
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.util
    Utility classes for Mapper package.

      static <ET extends Enum<ET>> 
      EnumResolver<ET>      		 EnumResolver.constructFor(Class<ET> enumCls, AnnotationIntrospector ai)
      Factory method for constructing resolver that maps from Enum.name() into Enum value
      static EnumResolver<?> EnumResolver.constructUnsafe(Class<?> rawEnumCls, AnnotationIntrospector ai)
      This method is needed because of the dynamic nature of constructing Enum resolvers.
      static EnumResolver<?> EnumResolver.constructUnsafeUsingMethod(Class<?> rawEnumCls, Method accessor)
      Method used when actual String serialization is indicated using @JsonValue on a method.
      static EnumResolver<?> EnumResolver.constructUnsafeUsingToString(Class<?> rawEnumCls)
      Method that needs to be used instead of constructUsingToString(java.lang.Class<ET>) if static type of enum is not known.
